fixes.name: Net Flow
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau aggregated calculated fields SUM([Deposit amount]) and SUM([Withdrawal Amount]) by applying filters directly in DAX using CALCULATE on the underlying 'accounts+'[Amount] column with 'accounts+'[TransactionType] = "Deposit" and "Withdrawal" respectively, then subtracting the two results.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
